songs.title: Only Girl (In The World)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Liam & Zayn]
I want you to love me
Like I'm a hot guy
Keep thinking of me, yeah
Doing what you like
So, girl, forget about the world
Cause it's gon' be me and you tonight
I'm gonna make you beg for it
And then I'm gonna swallow my pride

[Chorus: All]
I'm gonna make you feel like you're the only girl in the world
Like you're the only one that I'll ever love
Like I'm the only one that knows your heart
Only girl in the world
Like I'm the only one who's in command
'Cause you're the only one who understands
How to make me feel like a man
Only girl

[Bridge: All]
Take me for a ride, ride
Baby, take me high, high
Let me make you first, first
Make it last all night, night
Take me for a ride, ride
Baby, take me high, high
Let me make you first, first
Make it last all night, night

[Chorus: All]
I'm gonna make you feel like you're the only girl in the world
Like you're the only one that I'll ever love
Like I'm the only one that knows your heart
Only girl in the world
Like I'm the only one who's in command
'Cause you're the only one who understands
How to make me feel like a man
Only girl
